overview: Love comes in all kinds of colors. Trent Grossman is smart, handsome... and a racist. But when he loses his eyesight and his white-bread wife leaves him, he falls for two hot, horny women who just happen to be Latin and Asian! An experimental surgery could save his eyesight... but can they change his mind about stereotypes?
tagline: Black & White... and Pink All Over!
title: Color Blind
